name: Bloombase
tag_list: information, security, encryption, compliance, cryptography, identity, spitfire, keyparc
overview:
Bloombase develops and markets Spitfire and Keyparc information security compliance solutions for enterprises and organizations to address data at-rest and in-flight threats.

Focused on solving the problem of securing enterprise transit and storage data, Bloombase has pioneered the use of encryption and authentication technologies that fit transparently into any enterprise IT environment. Bloombase products and solutions are available from major OEMs, system integrators and resellers, and are deployed worldwide by governments, organizations and listed companies across industries including banking, financial services, healthcare, telecommunications, and manufacturing.

Bloombase formulates a vision for next generation enterprise application integration and electronic data interchange to secure and accelerate information exchange. This vision brings together distributed and heterogeneous systems with seamless connectivity and empowers enterprise applications and systems with security by use of state-of-the-art cryptographic, service oriented architecture and network technologies.

offices.address1: Level 11, C3, Innovation Building, 182 Kexue Road

milestones.description: Bloombase announced the completion of QLogic Storage Networking Interoperability testing and that Bloombase has joined the QLogic® NETtrack Alliance partners program.
milestones.source_description: Bloombase Completes QLogic Storage Networking Interoperability Testing

milestones.description: Bloombase data at-rest solution offers security capabilities for a reliable application transparent cipher-text information storage infrastructure.

Bloombase, Inc. announced the completion of ATTO Technology, Inc.'s Celerity FC HBAs and ATTO FibreConnect FC switches interoperability validation and that Bloombase has joined the ATTO Access Partner Program.
Bloombase joins EMC Technology Partner Program and Bloombase StoreSafe Security Server enters as featured product in EMC Solution Gallery
milestones.source_description: Bloombase joins EMC Technology Partner Program and Bloombase StoreSafe Security Server enters as featured product in EMC Solution Gallery

milestones.description: Bloombase joins VMware Technology Alliance Program and enters VMware Solution Exchange
milestones.source_description: Bloombase joins VMware Technology Alliance Program and enters VMware Solution Exchange

milestones.description: Bloombase StoreSafe at-rest encryption security software is qualified for Dell EqualLogic NAS
milestones.source_description: Bloombase StoreSafe is qualified for Dell EqualLogic

milestones.description: Enterprise data breaches shouldn't sneek up on you. Bloombase Protects enterprise virtual data centers powered by KVM
milestones.source_description: Bloombase announced virtual data center encryption for KVM

milestones.description: Bloombase achieves Dell Technology Partner Certification for EqualLogic NAS and Compellent SAN transparent data at-rest encryption security
